prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a tough female Saiyan warrior, muscular physique, short spiky black bob hair, confident ruthless expression, 8k realistic photo, dynamic lighting
feature_prompt: battle-worn metal texture on Saiyan armor, realistic spandex fabric weave, sweat on skin, defined athletic musculature, sharp gaze, subtle dirt and grit, combat damage
